Name: Wash Bow
LongDescription: Boosts the maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Totodile, Croconaw, and Feraligatr.  You can get a Wash Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Totodi-Dew, a Totodi-Fang, and a Water Heart. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
